abstract: Bank of America has increased the write-down on its FIA Card Services unit to reflect industry regulation and “deteriorating credit quality.”
snippet: Bank of America has increased the write-down on its FIA Card Services unit to reflect industry regulation and “deteriorating credit quality.”
lead_paragraph: Bank of America said on Monday that it had increased the write-down on its FIA Card Services unit to reflect industry regulation and “deteriorating credit quality.”

headline.main: Bank of America Doubles Write-Down on Credit Cards
